function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cleaning involving people can increase the spread of disease","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Use of sanitization methods without human contact, especially in areas with infected/suspected occupants","Technologies":"Disinfectant spraying systems with no human contact","People":"People conducting cleaning works","Owner":"Facility management or cleaning service providers"},{"Description":"Dependence on indoor materials for virus propagation","Impact":"Increased survival of viruses on different materials","Mitigation":"Selection of materials with antiviral properties and controlled porosity","Technologies":"Antiviral coatings, antiviral polymers, metal ions/oxides, functional nanoparticles","People":"Building designers, architects, material suppliers","Owner":"Building owners, developers"},{"Description":"Insufficient natural light in residential buildings","Impact":"Reduced ability to kill pathogens and prevent their activity","Mitigation":"Design residential houses to allow sufficient natural light","Technologies":"Strategic placement of windows, skylights, and light tubes","People":"Architects, building designers","Owner":"Building owners"}]}
